26743.<speed=0>\n『なかまにさそう』の 説明です！\n<br>\n『なかまに:
This will explain "Invite to Party"!
Using the "Invite to Party" command, you can invite nearby players to join your party.
If someone's Status Icon is set to something other than "Seeking Party", it's a good idea to ask them before sending an invitation.
If they agree to your invitation, they will join you and you will form a party.
While in a party, you can progress the story, battle, and chat with one another. You can even use your party member's Zoomstones.
Story progress will follow that of the leader, but if you are at the same story point, you will progress alongside them.
If you want to leave the party, use the "Party" command under "Misc." and choose "Leave Party".
If you're meeting for the first time, don't forget to say hello! Use good manners and have a fun time with your adventures in Astoltia!

27125.<speed=0>\nログイン状況表示設定の 説明です！\n<br>\nログイン:
This will explain login status!
There are three types of login statuses: "Show Login", "Hide Login", and "Appear Offline".
"Show Login" will display your status as logged in to your friends and teammates.
"Hide Login" will show you with a status of hidden to your friends and teammates.
You can still use Friend and Team chat with this login status enabled.
"Appear Offline" will show you with a status of "Offline" to your friends and teammates.
You cannot use Friend or Team chat with this status enabled.
Please note that your character will still be visible to others regardless of your chosen login status.

27233.<speed=0>\n「とりひき」の 説明です！\n<br>\n他のプレイヤーの:
This will explain trading!
If you offer to trade with another player's character and they accept, you can exchange items and Gold with that character.
Once you both select the items and Gold you want to exchange and both parties "Confirm", the transaction is complete!
During the transaction, you can also move the cursor to an item selected by the other party. Check if it's the correct item with "Examine".
All transactions between players are recorded. If you don't know the other party, be careful when dealing with them to avoid mistakes.
It is good manners to first confirm the transaction in advance via chat rather than making an abrupt offer.

27709.<speed=0>\n『なかまをさがす』の 説明です！\n<br>\nパーティを:
This will explain "Find a Party"!
To form a party with others, you can use the "Find a Party" command by using the "Misc." command, and then "Party".
You can search for other adventurers who have the "Seeking Party" Status Icon set. Choose a vocation and the goals that you want to pursue.
The search will cover all servers, so it doesn't matter where you search from. *Some specific story areas are excluded.
If you find someone who matches your goals, invite them!
You'll be able to use your party member's Zoomstones, so you can meet up at a place you've both been to.
If you're meeting for the first time, don't forget to say hello! Use good manners and have a fun time with your adventures in Astoltia!

27726.<speed=0>\nチームの 説明です！\n<br>\nチームとは 仲のよいプ:
This will explain "Teams"!
Teams are a feature that allows like-minded and close players to form a large group. A Team can have up to 255 members.
When you join a Team, you can chat with everyone who is a member. You can also customize a Team emblem and slogan.
There is a Team-specific bulletin board in the Awakening Adventurer's Square. You can contact and talk with members there if you wish.
Not being on a Team does not interfere with gameplay. You are free to choose whether or not you want to join one.
Once you are on a team, you can leave the team at any time from the "Team" menu in Misc.

28207.<speed=0>\n人から仲間に誘ってもらう方法の 説明です！\n<br>\n:
This will explain how to get people to invite you join their party!
In order for people to invite you to join them, you must set your "Status Icon" to "Seeking Party" so they know you want one.
To do this, go to "Settings" under "Misc.", then select "Status Icon" and check "Seeking Party".
Next, set the "Goal" you want to achieve. You can enter a goal like "Leveling" or "Side Quest" and a comment.
You are now a search target for the "Party Search" command. Wait for someone with the same goal to find you.
The search range for people looking for companions covers the entire world and all servers, so it doesn't matter where you wait.
If someone finds you, you'll receive an invite to join their party. You can't chat before you become companions, so it's a silent invite.
If you think it's okay, join the party. You can use your companion's Zoomstone. Meet up at a location where both of you have been.

28394.<speed=0>パーティを組んで 一緒に冒険してくれる\n仲間を探すには 『さ:
To form a party with others, you can use the "Find a Party" command by using the "Misc." command, and then "Party".
You can search for other adventurers who have the "Seeking Party" Status Icon set. Choose a vocation and the goals that you want to pursue.
The search will cover all servers, so it doesn't matter where you search from. *Some specific story areas are excluded.
If you find someone who matches your goals, invite them!
You'll be able to use your party member's Zoomstones, so you can meet up at a place you've both been to.
If you're meeting for the first time, don't forget to say hello! Use good manners and have a fun time with your adventures in Astoltia!

28395.<speed=0>\n人から仲間に誘ってもらうためには 自分が\n仲間を探してる:
In order for people to invite you to join them, you must set your "Status Icon" to "Seeking Party" so they know you want one.
To do this, go to "Settings" under "Misc.", then select "Status Icon" and check "Seeking Party".
Next, set the "Goal" you want to achieve. You can enter a goal like "Leveling" or "Side Quest" and a comment.
You are now a search target for the "Party Search" command. Wait for someone with the same goal to find you.
The search range for people looking for companions covers the entire world and all servers, so it doesn't matter where you wait.
If someone finds you, you'll receive an invite to join their party. You can't chat before you become companions, so it's a silent invite.
If you think it's okay, join the party. You can use your companion's Zoomstone. Meet up at a location where both of you have been.
If you're meeting for the first time, don't forget to say hello! Use good manners and have a fun time with your adventures in Astoltia!

30525.<speed=0>\n「通報する」は 禁止行為である 現実のお金での\nゲームデ:
"Report" is a command to report players who are suspected of trading game data for real money (RMT), which is a prohibited activity.
If you see a player with abnormal behavior, like multiple characters with unnatural names or suspicious movements, please report it.
The character information of the reported player will be recorded, and the reported player will be a subject of an investigation.
The system will keep a record of your report, but the person you reported will not be notified.
If you experience any violation or nuisance other than RMT, please report it in "Help?" under the "Misc." command.
Make Astoltia a better place for all adventurers to live by using the "Report" function.

A craftsman tool will be used to add effects to equipment, and all needed materials will be supplied by you.
If you request alchemy and the other player accepts, you can choose the equipment you want to receive effects.
However, please note that the alchemy will not always be successful. You may get an effect weaker than normal, or it may fail completely.
Please only request for alchemy after understanding these risks.

This will explain "Memo Pad"!
Memo Pad is a feature that allows you to write notes to your friends and team.
If you select "Write a Note", you can enter a note of up to 20 full-width characters. Notes you enter will be visible to everyone.
You can see everyone's notes on the loading screen or from "View a Note".
You can also check "Announcements" and set whether Memo Pad and Notices are displayed during loading.

42215.<speed=0>\n「チームクエストについての 説明です。\n<br>\n「チ:
This will explain Team Quests.
Team Quests are requests that are received from recognized countries. Multiple requests can be received at a time.
Team Quests can be viewed at any time by using "Misc.", "Team", and finally "Team Quests". All members see the same requests.
When a request is completed, any Team member can report it to a Team Ambassador, which will earn Team EXP.
Each request has a time limit. If you do not fulfill the request in time, it will expire.
Any expired requests can be renewed by speaking to any Team Ambassador.
Completing requests will earn Team EXP and increase the Team's level. A higher level means more Team functions and more
purchasable rewards.

42645.<speed=0>\n『チーム』は 仲のよいプレイヤー同士が\nグループとなるた:
A team is a group of players who are close to each other.

42646.<speed=0>\n『スキルふりわけ』では スキルポイントを使い\nとくぎの習:

42768.<speed=0>\n妖精の姿見に 新たに追加された\n４つの機能の説明です！\:
This is an explanation of the four new features added to the Fairy Mirror!
First is the ability to experiment with weapon and shield dyeing. Use the two color buttons next to the weapon and shield names.
The second is the ability to switch between poses with and without weapons and shields. Use the "Switch Pose" menu.
The third is the ability to switch one's reflection in the Fairy Mirror to that of another race. Please use "Change Race".
The fourth is the ability to show your current equipment in the Fairy Mirror. Please use the "Show Equipped" option in "Saved Outfit".
Please take advantage of these four new features when exploring your own creative and ingenious glamour!

44043.<speed=0>\nマイコーデ機能の説明です！\n<br>\nマイコーデとは:
This will explain glamour!
The glamour system allows you to register your currently equipped items as an appearance set.
Wearing a glamour set allows you to change the appearance of your current equipment without affecting its stats.
Once equipment is registered in a glamour set, you don't need to carry it around with you to continue using its appearance.
You can register the following as glamour: head, body, legs, hands, feet, face accessory, umbrella, and standing pose.

45451.<speed=0>\n遊びたいことリストの 説明です！\n<br>\n遊びたいこ:
This will explain "Playlist"!
The "Playlist" is a function that automatically notifies you when you have four friends with the same goal.
The notification is sent to all four friends, including yourself. By replying to it, you can form a party if everyone is available.
You will not see any information about others until you form a party. You will also not be able to see who declined the invitation.
It's easy to use. Just set the items you want to play with in the list!
For games that you and your friend can enjoy alone, such as the "Metal Maze Pair Ticket", you'll be notified when you two are together.
It can also be used between teams or rooms, so first try setting up a party you want to play with in the "Play Settings".

45764.<speed=0>\n遊びたいことリストとは\n同じ目的のフレンドが ４人いた場:
The "Playlist" is a function that automatically notifies you when you have four friends with the same goal.
The notification is sent to all four friends, including yourself. By replying to it, you can form a party if everyone is available.
You will not see any information about others until you form a party. You will also not be able to see who declined the invitation.
It's easy to use. Just set the items you want to play with in the list.
You can stop receiving notifications by moving the cursor to the notification function on the right and setting it to "Off".
You can also use the "Play Settings" to set up notifications not only for friends, but also for teams and rooms.
You can check which group has sent you a notification by clicking "Request". Rooms are indicated by their respective room names.
For games that you and your friend can enjoy alone, such as the "Metal Maze Pair Ticket", you'll be notified when you two are together.
Set a list of things you want to do with everyone on a regular basis!

48835.<speed=0>\n<color_yellow>『さくせん』メニュー内の 項目:
This is to inform you that some items in the "Misc." menu have been changed.
The "Memo Pad" menu item, which used to be in the "Misc." menu, has moved to "Communication" in the "Settings" menu.
From now on, please use "Misc." → "Settings" → "Communication" → "Memo Pad".
Additionally, the "Follow" command has been removed from the "Misc." menu.
If you want to use the "Follow" command, in the future, use the "Talk" command or select another person by using the handy button.
We have also added a new "Event Information" menu that allows you to check on the various events that are currently being held.

This will explain "Abyss Orbs!"
Abyss Orbs contain various pieces of equipment, in which you find inside Zelmea.
If you manage to reach the Zelmea's exit, you can break the seal on the orbs and receive the equipment contained within.
However, if you fall in battle or leave early, you will lose all of your orbs, so be careful.
You can check the orbs you've already obtained with the "View Abyss Orbs" command.

49130.<speed=0>\n顔アクセサリーが\n２個 表示できるようになりました！\n:
You can now have two face accessories displayed at a time!
You can use the "Face Glam" slot to equip another face accessory in addition to the normal "Face Acc." slot.
If you are wearing glasses that overlap one another, for example, the "Face Glam" slot will take priority.
Please note that the "Face Glam" slot is only for appearance, and does not affect your stats.
Try mix and matching different accessories to create your own unique look!

49137.『顔コーデ』についての 説明です！\n<br>\n２個目の 顔アクセサリーを 『:
This will explain Face Glamour!
By equipping a "face glamour", you can wear a second face accessory in addition to your normal face accessory.
If you wear items like glasses that overlap other face accessories, your face glamour will take precedence.
Please remember that face glamour is merely for appearance sake, and does not affect your stats.
To equip an accessory as a face glamour, select "Equip (Glam)" when equipping it.
Explore all kinds of different looks and have fun customizing your character!

50340.『プレイヤーイベント告知』では\n現在から ３６時間以内に 開催される\nプレイ:
The "Player Event Notices" section provides information on player events that will take place within the next 36 hours.
A player event is where adventurers act as organizers and play together with other adventurers in a variety of activities.
Here you can check the "Event Summary" and "Event Details" of a player event.
The "Event Summary" contains general information such as "Event Name", "Duration" and "Venue".
In the "Event Details" section, the organizer explains the event's policy and what kind of event it is.
However, if there are too many characters in the "Event Details" section, the entire text may not be displayed.
If you have questions or would like to host your own event, please visit the Awakening Adventurer's Square.
Dragon Quest X Awakening Adventurers Square player event notice page. https://sqex.to/DQXPE
If the organizer has set up "Movement Settings", you can go directly to that location.
If you want to participate in an event, feel free to go to the designated location.

53098.<speed=0>\n『環境設定』の 説明です。\n<br>\n『空・時間』では:
This is an explanation of "Preferences.
In the "Sky/Time"section, you can change the weather and sky scenery in the My Town, adjust the time of day, and even stop time.
In the "Distant View" section, you can change things like distant mountains. Changes will be easier to see in a location with a good view.
In the "Ground" section, you can set the appearance of roads and trees throughout the My Town.
In the "Signpost" section, you can set the appearance of the sign at the entrance to the My Town.
If you choose "Confirm", the My Town will change to your settings, and the residents can enjoy the My Town in the same environment.
You can change the settings at any time, so customize the overall appearance of the My Town and create an attractive town.

53104.<speed=0>\n『空・時間』の 説明です。\n<br>\nマイタウンの中の:
This is an explanation of "Sky/Time".
You can set the weather in the My Town to be sunny or rainy, or set the scenery floating in the sky.
You can also stop the time in the My Town and adjust the time of the day as desired, such as dawn, noon, or night.
If you do not stop time, the time of day will match the world outside the My Town, so if you want to adjust it, stop the time and set it.

53105.<speed=0>\n『遠景』の 説明です。\n<br>\nマイタウンの中から見:
This will explain "View"!
You can set the view of distant mountains and other scenery seen from within a My Town. Choose a view that matches the overall look.
Scenery changes will be easier to see in a location with a good view where you can see the entire distance.

53106.<speed=0>\n『地景』の 説明です。\n<br>\n家の立て札や マイタ:
This will explain "Ground"!
You can set the appearance of ground features such as roads, trees and house signs throughout the My Town.
Customize the appearance to suit your needs, such as changing it to one that represents the season.

53107.<speed=0>\n『立て札』の 説明です。\n<br>\nマイタウンの中に:
This will explain "Signpost"!
You can set the appearance of the signposts installed in your My Town. Please choose a sign with the image of your choice.

53395.『オープンハウス告知』では\n現在 開催されている\nオープンハウス告知の情報が:
The "Open House Notices" section provides information on current Open House Notices.
An open house is where an adventurer's house is open to the public for the purpose of introducing their house to other adventurers.
Here you can check the "Open House Summary" and "Selling Points".
The "Open House Summary" contains general information such as "Title", "Schedule", "Address" and "Category".
The "Selling Points" section describes the areas and features of the house that you would like to see.
However, if there are too many characters in the "Selling Points" section, the entire text may not be displayed.
If you have questions or would like to make an Open House Notice, please visit the Awakening Adventurer's Square.
Dragon Quest X Awakening Adventurers Square open house notice page. https://sqex.to/DQXOH
If the person making the notice has set up "Movement Settings", you can go directly to that address.
If you see a house that interests you, please feel free to visit it.

58976.『アストルティア放送局の設定』の 説明です。\n<br>\nアストルティア放送局:
This will explain "Astoltia Broadcast Station Settings".
The Astoltia Broadcast station allows you to watch programs related to Dragon Quest X right from inside the game.
Programs such as Super DQX TV and Dragon Quest Information Program will be broadcast, mainly from Nico Nico Live Broadcasting.
The "Watch" option will dictate whether or not you will see the broadcast. If it's off, the video will not play.
Turning off "Watch" will also disable other options, so please be aware of this.
If "Watch" is set to on, but you can't see the broadcast, please make sure the requirements are met.
Depending on your system, if you are close to the broadcast monitor, your gameplay quality may suffer and become unplayable.
If this happens, you can set Watch to "Off" in the login menu.
If you have your Status Icon set to "Streaming", you will not be able to watch the broadcast.
Turning on "View Comments" will allow you to view comments that others post during the broadcast.
If comments are displayed, any comments that meet the criteria of Nico Nico Douga will be displayed.
With "Send Comments", you can set whether or not to use the "Nearby Broadcast" chat mode to send broadcast comments.
If "Nearby Broadcast" is set, your chat will be sent to Nico Nico Douga as comments. Please be mindful of what you say.
"Monitor Quality" allows you to choose the quality of the broadcast screen. Please choose based on your environment and liking.
Please note that any changes will be reflected once you close the menu and the video reloads.
"Monitor Volume" allows you to set the volume of the broadcast.
Please check the Adventurer's Square for the Astoltia Broadcasting Station.
Player Only Site Dragon Quest X Awakening Adventurer's Square https://hiroba.dqx.jp
Use good manners and enjoy the broadcast!

61124.<speed=0>\nワンタッチきせかえ機能の説明です！\n<br>\nワンタッ:
This will explain Gear Sets!
Gear Sets can be used to swap quickly between registered sets of equipment.
You can register different Gear Sets for different situations or activities.
The slots "Right Hand", "Left Hand", and "Face Glam" will not be registered into a Gear Set.
Unlike the Glamour function, equipment must be in your equipment bag to change, and your current vocation must be able to equip it.
We hope you'll use this handy function to make swapping equipment even easier!

61464.<speed=0>\nついていく設定の 説明です！\n<br>\nついていく許可:
This will explain "Follow Setting"!
If you set the Follow Setting to "Don't Allow", then other players will not be able to follow you.
However, please note that changing this to "Don't Allow" while someone is already following you will not stop them.
If the Follow command is set to "Hide", you will no longer see the "Follow" command when inspecting other players.
Even if you change Follow to "Hide", it will not interrupt anyone that you are currently following.

63752.積み立てモードをオンにすることで バトルと酒場\nから得られる経験値を 現在の職:
By enabling EXP Saving, you can accrue EXP that you receive from battles and the tavern in your EXP Passbook.
You may withdraw to any vocation you wish. The maximum amount you can save at once is 5 million EXP.
EXP gained from extra sources such as Bonus Orbs, food, and the EXP Enhancer will also be saved into the EXP Passbook.
However, EXP gained from effects such as the Angel Slime Hat will not save, and instead be earned normally.
EXP gained from the Companion App and items such as EXP Scriptures also cannot be saved.
If in training mode, be sure to disable EXP Saving. If left on, EXP will be saved instead.
